DOC.brief_summary: Phase 1 study HVC ( Hepatitis C Virus ) infect subject determine pharmacokinetics , safety efficacy subject inadequate response prior treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Phase 1 Study To Evaluate Antiviral Activity Of Small Molecule Direct Antiviral Agent At Multiple Doses In Subjects With Chronically Infected Hepatitis C Virus .
DOC.criteria: HCV Positive With HCV RNA > 100,000 iu/ml Genotype 1 ; COHORT A non responder partial HIV HBV coinfection Decompensated liver disease Liver disease due cause HCV , AFP > 200ng/ml
